scripts.start: npm run generate-api && npm run build && node dist/vapi.js
scripts.generate-local-build: npm install && npm run build && npm pack
scripts.test:example: npm run pack:local && cd example && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean-builds: rm -f vapi-ai-web-*.tgz && echo 'ğŸ§¹ Cleaned up all build tarballs'
scripts.dev:example: npm run pack:local && cd example && npm install && npm run dev
